entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the morning. 30 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating early in the morning. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High 7. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 10:44 PM EST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
